messages.title: Focus - Stronger Economy Fairer Society
messages.content: On May 7th, you will have the opportunity to vote for the Party that represents Westminster and on Purbeck District Council.

messages.title: Campaigning for St Martin
messages.content: Beryl and Keith supported the acquisition of Sandford Church by the Parish Council. St Martin Lib Dems stay in touch with residents all year round.

messages.title: The ST MARTIN TEAM SETS THE PACE
messages.content: Hundreds of local residents say they are backing Vikki and the St Martin Lib Dem team.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A balanced budget for Britain and £8 billion extra for the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have committed to invest £8 billion a year more in the NHS to ensure it remains a world class service we can continue to be proud of.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s a clear fight between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives. Voting for Labour or the Greens will only make it easier for the Conservatives to win. It's so close here!

issues.environment: Fighting with Purbeck Lib Dems to protect local bus services.
issues.governance: Campaigning to protect Wareham from a potential gravel pit.
issues.health: A balanced budget for Britain and £8 billion extra for the NHS.

housing.content: Beryl and Keith supported the acquisition of Sandford Church by the Parish Council.

leaflet.personalStatement: Beryl Ezzard - Beryl has a voice in Purbeck all her life. Clerking in public about it. Make sure you vote to keep the best team on May 7th.

politicalExperience.achievements: working hard all year round for St Martin

endorsements.endorsement: Vikki Slade is the best to succeed Annette Brooke as MP Dorset and North Poole's next MP.

quotes.text: Back the best team for St Martin.
Vikki, Beryl, and Keith are the best team for St Martin.

images.caption: Vikki Slade, Clerks Keith Green and Beryl Ezzard are the best team for St Martin.
